name: Ghost in the Shell Terminal
description: A human-in-the-loop terminal skill for AnythingLLM. All shell commands from the AI are routed to a GUI for user approval and execution inside a Docker container. Features allow/deny modes, Docker image selection, live terminal output, and memorable quotes from cyberpunk and hacker movies.
author: Elias

examples.prompt: starte ghost in the shell terminal

sessionId.description: Unique session ID for the shell container
